duties_responsibilities.duty: Supervise and review internal and external communications for marketing and advertising content to ensure compliance with regulations.
Consult with business and control partners on regulatory issues involving marketing and advertising materials.
Provide training for business partners and Registered Principals on marketing compliance issues.
Assist with internal audits, compliance assessments, and regulatory exams.
Collaborate with senior levels of management within the business, Legal, Risk, Compliance, Platform, Technology, and third-party vendors.
Maintain the MAC disclosure library and website content.
